short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the font-family of all text on a page to Inter font

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you have trouble reading long texts on serif fonts or other types of fonts, and prefer to read on a neutral sans-serif font like Inter, then just hit Ctrl+Shift+Q on your keyboard, or just click on the extension icon, and all the texts on the active tab will change to Inter! That easy!
